getSystemTimeHB

public static Function<?,Long> getSystemTimeHB(long delta)
A Function to generate heartbeats using System.currentTimeMillis() - delta. It can be used when incoming objects get the system time as timestamp and the skew is known.

Parameters:
delta - delivers
Returns:
A function to generate heartbeats.

getSystemTimeHB

public static Function<?,Long> getSystemTimeHB()
A Function to generate heartbeats using System.currentTimeMillis. It can be used for source.setNextHBFunction when incoming objects get the system time as timestamp.

Returns:
A function to generate heartbeats.

getTestHB

public static Function<?,Long> getTestHB(int numberOfHeartbeats)
A test function to generate heartbeats using an enumerator.

Parameters:
numberOfHeartbeats - the number of heartbeats that are delivered. A value below zero delivers infinite number of heartbeats.
Returns:
A function to generate test heartbeats.

getTestHBCursor

public static Function<?,Long> getTestHBCursor(Enumerator c)
A test function to generate heartbeats using an enumerator. value below zero delivers infinite number of heartbeats.

Returns:
A function to generate test heartbeats.

A test function to generate heartbeats using an enumerator. value below zero delivers infinite number of heartbeats.

A function to generate test heartbeats.

pos -
epsilon -
Returns:
